column1: #Text=Oh yes, it's so easy to balance the budget!
#Text=How's Wynne doing in Ontario, I wonder.
#Text=She gets billions more each year in transfers for health, infrastructure, education from the federal government.
#Text=She gave cops (OPP) an extra about 10% two years ago, even the 10%-ers, the teachers, got a raise a few weeks ago (despite 'net-zero' promises).
#Text=Surely, Ontario must have a large surplus!
#Text=Or at least a negligible surplus or deficit.What?!
#Text=She's running a $10 billion deficit on top of $10 billion off the books on 'infrastructure'?
#Text=But... it's so easy to get surpluses!
#Text=Wynne certainly can't do it... strange, since it's so easy.
